nodes.text: The Sundiver was an Acclamator-class assault ship in use by the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. It was captained by Commander Adar Tallon. Wils was a crewman onboard the ship.

Near the end of the Wars, it served as flagship of the fleet assigned to High Generals Saesee Tiin and Plo Koon, accompanying them to the Rendili system and engaging rebellious Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers in combat.
